home.description: This portfolio documents my internship journey as part of the Graduate Programming program at AP Hogeschool. Here, I share my experiences, lessons, and growth during my workplace learning period.
home.techDescription: This is the tech stack I’m able to work with. More will be added soon!
home.projectsDescription: Here are my key projects demonstrating my technical capabilities.
home.experienceDescription: My professional journey in the tech industry so far.
home.skillsDescription: Core competencies I bring to development teams.
home.educationDescription: My formal education in information technology.

experienceDescriptions.beego: I helped clients with basic tech issues at their homes or businesses, such as fixing computers and explaining how to stay safe online.
experienceDescriptions.digipolis: I learned the basics of ICT support by setting up computers and assisting with network setups. It was a great way to see how things work outside of programming.

about.title: Full-Stack Developer in Training
about.educationText: I’m currently studying Programming at AP Hogeschool, learning both frontend and backend development. While I enjoy the logic of backend work, I’m also improving my frontend skills to build complete applications from start to finish.
about.languagesText: I’m a native Spanish speaker, fluent in Dutch, and comfortable working in English. This helps me collaborate in diverse teams and understand technical resources in multiple languages.
about.aiPhilosophyText: I see AI as a helpful partner in coding—great for suggesting improvements and catching mistakes, while I maintain full control and understanding of my projects.
about.aiApproachText: I mainly use AI for code suggestions, improving existing solutions, and writing documentation. I’m always careful not to share private code or data with AI tools.
about.aiExample: While building this portfolio, I used AI for layout ideas and troubleshooting, but every decision and line of code is my own.
about.goalsText: I aim to become a fullstack developer focused on maintaining and optimizing existing systems. My priority is improving efficiency and functionality rather than always building new technologies.
about.goalsPhilosophy: It’s not just about creating new features, but about keeping existing systems future-proof and maintainable.
about.methodsText1: I do this by learning new technologies while deepening my existing knowledge—finding a balance between innovation and the practical application of proven solutions.
about.methodsText2: I learn through books like ‘Clean Code’ and ‘Don’t Make Me Think,’ combined with AI-driven learning methods. I’m always looking for ways to improve code quality and maintainability.

footer.description: Documenting my internship journey at [Company Name] as part of the Programming program at AP Hogeschool.
